title: Sources
text:
All stock market data in the project comes from the “quantmod” library.
The project utilized ggplot to create a viewable graph.
Special thanks to ChatGPT for helping transform data into the plots.

title: About
text:
Hi, my name is Aedan. (Class of 2027).
My email is: u2rjal@gmail.com
This project about the correlation of the stock market (S&P 500), and US presidents is located in a repository here.
This project is also related to another past project here.
Both projects were created as a part of Kane’s Data Science Bootcamp.
Site Last Updated: 8/5/2024

title: Stock Market Performance Under Different Presidents
text:
[1] "GSPC"














  Click to visit “Growth” 


 Sources View project sources 


 About View information about this project 



The stock market’s performance varies upon different presidential administrations. Stock market correlation with presidential terms allows us to see the movement of the S&P 500 during periods of time. This dataset uses quantmod and dplyr to obtain all stock market data and movement. Although there are periods of time where the stock market falls or stagnates, it tends to move upwards in the long-term.
